title: Armen Tigranyan
text: Armen Tigranyan (; born 27 November 1985) is an <a href="Armenia">Armenia</a>n former <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>. He was also a member of the <a href="Armenia%20national%20football%20team">Armenia national team</a>, and has participated in 3 international matches since his debut in an away <a href="2006%20FIFA%20World%20Cup%20qualification%20%28UEFA%29">2006 World Cup qualification</a> match against <a href="Czech%20Republic%20national%20football%20team">Czech Republic</a> on 7 September 2005.
